solution_line_template: Since Paul makes {trips_per_day} trips per day, and each trip involves going both down and up, this means he travels the full vertical distance of his apartment complex {trips_per_day}*{up_and_down_per_trip}=<<{trips_per_day}*{up_and_down_per_trip}={trips_per_day_total}>>{trips_per_day_total} times a day.
Since there are {days_in_week} days in a week, this means he makes this trip {trips_per_day_total}*{days_in_week}={trips_per_week} times a week.
Since each story is {feet_per_story} feet tall, that means with {stories} stories he travels {stories}*{feet_per_story}= <<{stories}*{feet_per_story}={feet_per_trip}>>{feet_per_trip} feet each trip.

Since he made {trips_per_week} trips of {feet_per_trip} feet each, this means he traveled {feet_per_trip}*{trips_per_week}= <<{feet_per_trip}*{trips_per_week}={total_feet}>>{total_feet} feet in a week.
